Export.Routine:
MEDDrugInteraction #include COMSYS #include INConst #include VARConst #include MEDConst quit OnAfterSave(pYKEY) quit OnAfterDelete(pYKEY) quit ShowInteractionPrescriptionMessage(pYKEY,window=1) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Show Interaction Message for Drugs from the Prescription ; ; Params: ; pYKEY : KEY ID ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 20-Jan-2014 shobby SMSPE-15: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idLine1, idLine2, objItem1, objItem2, objLine2,msg,item, item1,idItem1, idItem2, intCont new idLine, idPrescription, qtdTotal, objLine1, arrGrid, strStatus, idMainLine,numeroLinha, tamanho set msg = "" set intCont = 0 if '$$$NoKey(pYKEY) { set idPrescription = $piece(pYKEY,",",1) $$$GRIDGetContents(.arrGrid,"MEDPrescriptionLine") set idLine1 = "" SET idLine2 = "" for { set idLine1 = $order(arrGrid(idPrescription,idLine1)) quit:idLine1="" set objLine1 = $get(arrGrid(idPrescription,idLine1)) set idItem1 = $$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objLine1) for { set idLine2 = $order(arrGrid(idPrescription,idLine2)) quit:idLine2="" set objLine2 = $get(arrGrid(idPrescription,idLine2)) set idItem2 = $$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objLine2) set objItem1 = $get(^MEDDrugInteraction(0,idItem1,idItem2,1)) if (objItem1 '="") set msg=msg_$$GetMessage(idItem1,idItem2,objItem1, , .intCont) } } } if (msg'="") do PrepareMessage(msg,window) quit ShowInteractionMessage(pYKEY="", pblnValidOnly=$$$NO, window=1,pidPrescription="") ;SMSPE-15 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Show Interaction Message for Drugs ; called by Drug Interaction Button on MEDDispenseLine ; ; Params: ; pYKEY : KEY ID ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; Boolean ; ; History: ; 31-Jan-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Use common code ; 07-Aug-2012 PPP SR18067: Updated to check diluents ; 16-Jul-2012 SCR SR18002: Changed to look at all active ; 13-Jun-2012 PPP SR18002.1: Added Diluent Drug Interaction ; 04-Jun-2012 PPP SR18002: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strMsg,intCont set intCont=0 do CheckDrugInteraction(pYKEY, pblnValidOnly,,.strMsg,.intCont) if strMsg'="" do PrepareMessage(strMsg,window,.intCont) quit PrepareMessage(pstrMsg="",pblnWindow=1,pintCont) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Show Interaction Message for Drugs from the Prescription ; ; Params: ; pYKEY : KEY ID ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; Boolean ; ; History: ; 20-Jan-2014 shobby SMSPE-15: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new intLines,intSize if (pblnWindow){ set intLines = $l(pstrMsg,"
")+2 set intSize = intLines * 27 if (intSize > 600){ set intSize = 600 } set pstrMsg = $replace(pstrMsg,"'","`") set pstrMsg = $$$Text($lb("MED00416",pintCont))_pstrMsg //Dispense contains %1 Drug Interaction(s)
do Show^WWWPopupMessage(pstrMsg,,,,"dscPopupDrugInteraction",,,,$$$YES,,600) ;SMSPE-15 } else { write "" write "" write "" write pstrMsg write "
" write "" write "
" } quit GetInteractionMessage(&parrDrugs,&pintCont,pidRx,pidCurDisp="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Get Interaction Message for Drugs ; ; Params: ; parrDrugs List of drugs , Count , Rx ; ; ; Returns: ; Message ; ; History: ; 19-Feb-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Dont Check Current Dispense (If loaded from edit grid) ; 04-Jul-2012 SCR SR17993: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strMsg,idItem1,idItem2,objItem,idDiluent,objRx,idPatient set strMsg="" set objRx = $get(^MEDPrescription(YM,pidRx,1)) set idPatient = $$$MEDPrescriptionPatientID(objRx) do DrugLoad(idPatient,.parrDrugs,pidCurDisp) set idItem1 = "" for { set idItem1 = $order(parrDrugs("h",idItem1)) quit:idItem1="" set idItem2 = "" for { set idItem2 = $order(parrDrugs("h",idItem2)) quit:idItem2="" continue:idItem1=idItem2 continue:('$data(parrDrugs("l",idItem1))&&'$data(parrDrugs("l",idItem2))) set objItem = $get(^MEDDrugInteraction(0,idItem1,idItem2,1)) if (objItem '="") && $$$MEDDrugInteractionActive1(objItem) { if (+$get(parrDrugs("h",idItem1))<$h) || (+$get(parrDrugs("h",idItem2))<$h) { continue } set strMsg = strMsg_$$GetMessage(idItem1,idItem2,objItem, , .pintCont) set parrDrugs("x",idItem1,idItem2)="" set parrDrugs("x",idItem2,idItem1)="" } } //End of Multi Line Interaction } quit strMsg GetMessage(pidItem1,pidItem2,pobjItem1, &parrItems, &pintCont) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Display Interaction Message for Drugs ; ; Params: ; pidItem1,pidItem2,pobjItem1, &parrItems, &pintCont ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; None ; ; History: ; 25-Jul-2012 PPP SR18067: Initialize variable strMsg ; 13-Jun-2012 PPP SR18002: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idClinic,idInteraction,idProbablity,strMsg set idClinic = "" set idInteraction = "" set idProbablity = "" set parrItems(pidItem1,pidItem2) = $increment(parrItems(pidItem1,pidItem2)) set strMsg = "" //SR18067 if ($$$MEDDrugInteractionClinicalImportance(pobjItem1)'= ""){ set idClinic = $$GetParamDesc^INPARA("MEDCLIIMP",$$$MEDDrugInteractionClinicalImportance(pobjItem1)) } if ($$$MEDDrugInteractionInteractionImportance(pobjItem1)'= ""){ set idInteraction = $$GetParamDesc^INPARA("MEDCLIIMP",$$$MEDDrugInteractionInteractionImportance(pobjItem1)) } if ($$$MEDDrugInteractionOccuranceProbability(pobjItem1)'= ""){ set idProbablity = $$GetParamDesc^INPARA("MEDPROBABILITY",$$$MEDDrugInteractionOccuranceProbability(pobjItem1)) } if (parrItems(pidItem1,pidItem2) < 2){ set pintCont = $Increment(pintCont) set strMsg = "

"_$$^WWWFORMNAME("MEDDrugInteraction")_" #"_pintCont_"

"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","P",1)_": "_"("_pidItem1_") "_$$^INARTNAME(pidItem1)_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","P",2)_": "_"("_pidItem2_") "_$$^INARTNAME(pidItem2)_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",1)_": "_idClinic_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",2)_": "_idInteraction_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",3)_": "_$$$MEDDrugInteractionEarlyInteraction(pobjItem1)_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",4)_": "_idProbablity_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",5)_": "_$$$MEDDrugInteractionEffect(pobjItem1)_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",6)_": "_$$$MEDDrugInteractionMechanism(pobjItem1)_"
"_ ""_$$^WWWFELDNAME("MEDDrugInteraction","D",7)_": "_$$$MEDDrugInteractionSuggestion(pobjItem1)_"

" } quit strMsg CheckDrugInteraction(pYKEY,pblnValidOnly=$$$NO,pblnProcess=$$$NO,&pstrMessage,&pintCont) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Check if Interaction Message exist for Drugs ; called by Drug Interaction Button on MEDDispenseLine ; ; Params: ; pYKEY : KEY ID ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; Boolean ; ; History: ; 19-Feb-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Dont check unvalidated lines ; 01-Feb-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Check Rejected ; 31-Jan-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Return Message ; 30-Jan-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Include Recjected when not suspended ; 07-Aug-2012 PPP SR18067: Updated to check diluents ; 24-Jul-2012 PPP SR18067: Added $$$YQHandler ; 16-Jul-2012 SCR SR18002 Acced all Active Drug checking ; 13-Jun-2012 PPP SR18002.1: Added Diluent Drug Interaction ; 04-Jun-2012 PPP SR18002: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnExist,idDispense,idLine1,idLine2,objLine1,objLine2,arrGrid,idItem1 new objItem1,idItem2,idDiluent,objItem2,objDispense,idRx,arrDrugs,dtTo set YQ = $$$YQDisable("MED00417") //Dispense does not contain any Drug Interactions. set blnExist = $$$NO set idDispense = $piece(pYKEY,",",1) set objDispense = $get(^MEDDispense(YM,idDispense,1)) set idRx = $$$MEDDispensePrescription(objDispense) if '$$$NoKey(pYKEY) { set idDispense = $piece(pYKEY,",",1) $$$GRIDGetContents(.arrGrid,"MEDDispenseLine") set idLine1 = "" for { set idLine1 = $order(arrGrid(idDispense,idLine1)) quit:idLine1="" set objLine1 = $get(arrGrid(idDispense,idLine1)) ;continue:$$$MEDDispenseLineValidatedStatus(objLine1)="refuse.gif" set objRxLine = $get(^MEDPrescriptionLine(YM,idRx,idLine1,1)) if ($$$MEDDispenseLineValidatedStatus(objLine1)="refuse.gif") { ;if ($$$MEDDispenseLineValidatedStatus(objLine1)="refuse.gif") && ; ($$$MEDPrescriptionLineStatus(objRxLine) = 6) { continue } if $$$MEDDispenseLineValidation(objLine1)'=1 continue ; HEVA-792 vvvv ;if pblnValidOnly { ; continue:'$$$MEDDispenseLineValidation(objLine1) ;} ; HEVA-792 ^^^^ if pblnProcess { continue:$$$MEDDispenseLineValidatedStatus(objLine1)="blank_flat.gif" } set idItem1 = $$$MEDDispenseLineItemName(objLine1) set dtTo= $$$MEDDispenseLineToDate(objLine1) set:dtTo>+$get(arrDrugs("h",idItem1)) arrDrugs("h",idItem1)=dtTo_Y_idRx_Y_idLine1 set arrDrugs("l",idItem1)="" set idDiluent = $$$MEDDispenseLineDiluent(objLine1) if idDiluent'="" { ;set arrDrugs("d",idItem1,idDiluent)="" set arrDrugs("l",idDiluent)="" set:dtTo>+$get(arrDrugs("h",idDiluent)) arrDrugs("h",idDiluent)=dtTo_Y_idRx_Y_idLine1 ;set arrDrugs("h",idDiluent)="" } } } set pstrMessage = $$GetInteractionMessage(.arrDrugs,.pintCont,idRx,$get(idDispense)) if pstrMessage'="" { set blnExist=$$$YES $$$YQHandler(blnExist) } quit blnExist DrugLoad(pidPatient,&parrDrugs,pidCurDisp="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Get Drugs for patient ; ; Params: ; pid, parrDrugs List of drugs ; ; ; Returns: ; Message ; ; History: ; 19-Feb-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Dont Check Current Dispense (If loaded from edit grid) ; 30-Jan-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Include closed drugs, Rejected & (Suspended & dispensed) ; 06-Jul-2012 SCR SR17993: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idRx,objRx,idLine,objLine,idxPat,idStatus,idItem,dtTo if ($get(pidPatient)'="") { set idxPat=$$$Index(pidPatient) set idRx="" for { set idRx=$order(^MEDPrescriptions(YM,1,idxPat,idRx),-1) quit:idRx="" set objRx=$get(^MEDPrescription(YM,idRx,1)) do LoadDispenses(idRx,.parrDrugs,pidCurDisp) ; HEVA-792 set idLine="" /* for { set idLine=$order(^MEDPrescriptionLine(YM,idRx,idLine)) quit:idLine="" set objLine=$get(^MEDPrescriptionLine(YM,idRx,idLine,1)) set idStatus = $$$MEDPrescriptionLineStatus(objLine) ; HEVA-792 vvvv ;continue:idStatus>4 ; HEVA-792 if (idStatus=8) || (idStatus=9) { continue } if idStatus=6 { if '$$$MEDPrescriptionLineDispensedQty(objLine) { continue } } ; HEVA-792 ^^^^ set dtTo= $$$MEDPrescriptionLineToDate(objLine) set idItem = $$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(objLine) set:dtTo>+$get(parrDrugs("h",idItem)) parrDrugs("h",idItem)=dtTo_Y_idRx_Y_idLine set idItem = $$$MEDPrescriptionLineDiluent(objLine) if idItem'="" { set:dtTo>+$get(parrDrugs("h",idItem)) parrDrugs("h",idItem)=dtTo_Y_idRx_Y_idLine } } */ } } quit LoadDispenses(pidRx,&parrDrugs,pidCurDisp="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Load Dispensed Drugs including Alternate and Modified Diluents ; ; Params: Rx & Array ; ; Returns: Updated array ; ; History: ; 26-Feb-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Check Rejected Lines ; 20-Feb-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Correction ; 19-Feb-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Dont Check Current Dispense (If loaded from edit grid) ; 19-Feb-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Dont check unvalidated dispenses & lines ; 30-Jan-2013 SCR HEVA-792: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idxRx,idDisp,idLine,objLine,idItem,dtTo,objRxLine,objDisp,blnDispensed set idxRx = $$$Index(pidRx) set idDisp = "" for { set idDisp = $order(^MEDDispenses(YM,1,idxRx,idDisp)) quit:idDisp="" ;if idDisp=pidCurDisp continue set objDisp = $get(^MEDDispense(YM,idDisp,1)) set idLine = "" if $$$MEDDispenseStatus(objDisp)<2 Continue for { set idLine = $order(^MEDDispenseLine(YM,idDisp,idLine)) quit:idLine="" set objLine = $get(^MEDDispenseLine(YM,idDisp,idLine,1)) set dtTo = $$$MEDDispenseLineToDate(objLine) set idItem = $$$MEDDispenseLineItemName(objLine) set objRxLine = $get(^MEDPrescriptionLine(YM,pidRx,idLine,1)) if ($$$MEDDispenseStatus(objDisp) = 3) && ($data(^MEDDispensePickLine(YM,idDisp,idLine,1))) { set blnDispensed = $$$YES } else { set blnDispensed = $$$NO } if ($$$MEDDispenseLineValidatedStatus(objLine)="refuse.gif") && ($$$MEDPrescriptionLineStatus(objRxLine) = 6) && (blnDispensed = $$$NO) { ;($$$MEDPrescriptionLineStatus(objRxLine) = 6) { continue } if $$$MEDDispenseLineValidation(objLine)'=1 continue if idItem'="" { set:dtTo>+$get(parrDrugs("h",idItem)) parrDrugs("h",idItem)=dtTo_Y_pidRx_Y_idLine } set parrDrugs("disp",pidRx,idLine)="" set idItem = $$$MEDDispenseLineDiluent(objLine) if idItem'="" { set:dtTo>+$get(parrDrugs("h",idItem)) parrDrugs("h",idItem)=dtTo_Y_pidRx_Y_idLine } } } quit OnAfterDataFields(pYKEY) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Show Drugs Interactions ; ; Params: ; pid ; ; ; Returns: ; Message ; ; History: ; 08-Jan-2013 SCR HEVA-748: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new lstHeader,rs,intCount,idInteractiveDrug,idClinicalImportance,idInteractionImportance,fltEarlyInteraction,idOccuranceProbability new strKey,strInteractiveDrug,strClinicalImportance,strInteractionImportance,strOccuranceProbability if ($$$NoKey(pYKEY)) quit // Monta cabeçalho da tabela set lstHeader = $listbuild("Seq.",$$$Text("MED01413"),$$$Text("MED01414"),$$$Text("MED01415"),$$$Text("MED01416"),$$$Text( "MED01417" )) ;Interactive Drug ;Clinical
Importance ;Interaction
Importance ;Interaction Time ;Interaction Probability if ($$Start^COMTable(lstHeader, "
" _ $$$Text("MED01412") _"
", , , $$$NO)) { ;Registered Drug Interactions set rs = ##class(%ResultSet).%New() do rs.Prepare("SELECT InteractiveDrug, ClinicalImportance, "_ " InteractionImportance,EarlyInteraction, "_ " OccuranceProbability "_ "FROM MEDDrugInteraction "_ "WHERE Drug = ? "_ "ORDER BY InteractiveDrug") do rs.Execute($$$KEY1(pYKEY)) set intCount = 0 while (rs.Next()) { if ($System.Status.IsOK(rs)) { // check if this succeeded // without errors // Pegando valores da query set idInteractiveDrug = rs.GetData(1) set idClinicalImportance = rs.GetData(2) set idInteractionImportance = rs.GetData(3) set fltEarlyInteraction = rs.GetData(4) set idOccuranceProbability = rs.GetData(5) set strKey = $$$KEY1(pYKEY)_$$$COMMA_idInteractiveDrug set strInteractiveDrug = idInteractiveDrug_" - "_ $$$INARTSearchName($get(^INART(YM, idInteractiveDrug, 1))) set strClinicalImportance = idClinicalImportance if ($length(idClinicalImportance) > 0) { set strClinicalImportance = $$$VARPARAText($get(^INPARA(YM, "MEDCLIIMP", SPRACHE, idClinicalImportance, 1))) } set strInteractionImportance = idInteractionImportance if ($length(strInteractionImportance) > 0) { set strInteractionImportance = $$$VARPARAText($get(^INPARA(YM, "MEDCLIIMP", SPRACHE, idInteractionImportance, 1))) } set strOccuranceProbability = idOccuranceProbability if ($length(idOccuranceProbability) > 0) { set strOccuranceProbability = $$$VARPARAText($get(^INPARA(YM, "MEDPROBABILITY", SPRACHE, idOccuranceProbability, 1))) } set intCount = $increment(intCount) do NewLine^COMTable() do InsertCell^COMTable(intCount, YFORM, strKey) do InsertCell^COMTable(strInteractiveDrug, YFORM, strKey) do InsertCell^COMTable(strClinicalImportance, YFORM, strKey, , "CENTER") do InsertCell^COMTable(strInteractionImportance,YFORM, strKey, , "CENTER") do InsertCell^COMTable(fltEarlyInteraction, YFORM, strKey, , "CENTER") do InsertCell^COMTable(strOccuranceProbability, YFORM, strKey) do EndLine^COMTable() } } if (intCount = 0) { do NewLine^COMTable() do InsertCell^COMTable( $$$Text("MED01418") , , , , , , 6) ;No interaction recorded for this medicine do EndLine^COMTable() } do NewLine^COMTable("lightsteelblue") do InsertCell^COMTable(""_$$$Text("MED01419")_"",YFORM, $$$KEY1(pYKEY), , "RIGHT", , 6) ;Register new interaction do EndLine^COMTable() do Stop^COMTable() } quit
